message:
SYSTEM: GATE(v3-ele_and).pdf: Página 30
JAVA Right Hand Side
• public void doit(Document doc, Map bindings, AnnotationSet 
annotations, AnnotationSet inputAS, AnnotationSet outputAS, 
Ontology ontology) throws JapeException
• Each labeled section of the LHS results in an Annotation Set 
that can be retrieved from the bindings map
• AnnotationSet set = 
(AnnotationSet)bindings.get("labelname");
• All features of an annotation are stored in a map
• FeatureMap map = annotation.getFeatures()
• Each feature is accessed by name
• Object obj = map.get(“featurename”)
• New annotations should always be created in the outputAS
• outputAS.add(start,end,label,features)
JAPE RULES
speaker: SYSTEM
